description: A Latinised version of the Japanese name for the plant, 南天 (ナンテン, nanten), first used by Carl Peter Thunberg.

entries.meaning: (botany) Heavenly bamboo or sacred bamboo, an ornamental plant of species Nandina domestica), sole member of genus Nandina (in family Berberidaceae), native to east Asia from the Himalayas to Japan.
